value: Uh-oh! Someone lost their wallet...\nIt had all the funds for the trip inside!
Wait—they BOTH lost their wallets!\nThe pair continued on in silence...
Luckily it was held for safekeeping!\nPhew! What a thing to forget...
It was returned to them by a kind owl!\nThey thanked it as it went on its way.
Inherited Attuned Skills cannot be\nequipped with exclusive skills other\nthan weapon skills (with exceptions).
Inherited Attuned Skills can't be inherited again.

Since the source ally is an Attuned
Hero, they will not be lost, but you
will no longer be able to use them
as a source ally when inheriting skills
or when creating Combat Manuals.

Inherited Attuned Skills cannot be
inherited again, nor can they be
equipped with exclusive skills other
than weapon skills (with exceptions).
When merging two Attuned Heroes, the target\nally will not gain an additional Attuned Skill.

Rearmed/Attuned Heroes:
Rearmed Heroes and Attuned
Heroes can use a special type of
skill inheritance that differs from
the inheritance used by Heroes
under typical circumstances.

Elite Inheritance:
In contrast with inheritance as it
usually occurs, when performing
elite inheritance, the source ally
will not be lost (once for each
eligible summoned Hero, and
the eligible Hero cannot create
Combat Manuals afterward).

Inheritance Limits:
・ Once a skill like an arcane
weapon or Attuned Skill has been
inherited, it cannot be inherited
again by any other Hero.

Attuned Skills Restrictions:
Only Attuned Heroes can equip
both their Attuned Skill and
an exclusive skill (such as Gray
Waves, etc.) other than Sing,
Dance, or Play at the same time.

Attuned Heroes - Pre-Inheritance:
In contrast with standard inheritance,
Attuned Skills can be inherited
and the source ally will not be lost in
the process. This can be performed
only once for each Attuned Hero
summoned. (See the Inherit Skills
menu Help messages to learn more.)

Attuned Heroes - Elite Inheritance:
In contrast with standard inheritance,
Attuned Skills can be inherited
and the source ally will not be lost in
the process. This can be performed
only once for each Attuned Hero
summoned. (See the Inherit Skills
menu Help messages to learn more.)
